data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cadena-Castañeda, Oscar J., Braun, Holger (2011): A new brachypterous genus of Platyphyllini (Orthoptera, Tettigoniidae, Pseudophyllinae) from Colombia. Zootaxa 2763: 34-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.203146
